item.description:
Únase a nosotros para más conversaciones informales en español.

Join us at this Meetup for more informal conversations in Spanish.

 

Katie recommended to spend part of the meetup time doing exercises in the book "The Ultimate Spanish Review and Practice"  (McGraw Hill).   If you can pick up the book, great - if not, you can look on with someone else.  (And for meetings when native Spanish speakers attend, we'll forget about using the book that week.)

 

¡Los hablantes nativos! Nos encantaría que nos acompañen, como un Intercambio. Podemos ayudarle a mejorar su Inglés al tiempo que ayuda a aprender más español.

 

Native speakers !!! We would love you to join us. We can help you improve your English while helping us learn more Spanish. Todos bienvenidos.

 

Hasta luego,

Don
item.how_to_find_us: Look in the back dining area for us

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: SS Spanish Meetup @ Panera Bread Braintree 2nd & 4th Wed. of month @ 7 PM
